videos.description: Aleksej Pokusevski works his way through traffic, then takes off to stuff down a two-handed dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Aleksej Pokusevski gets into the lane for a slam) 2021/12/27 ESHEET

videos.headline: Aleksej Pokusevski gets into the lane for a slam

videos.description: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander works his way into the paint and puts up a nice shot over the defense for a tough bucket.
